column2: Formulate an ontology related to institution. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix inst: <http://example.org/institution#> .inst:Institution rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Institution" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing an organization or entity with specific goals and purposes." .inst:University rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf inst:Institution ;    rdfs:label "University" ;    rdfs:comment "An institution of higher education and research." .inst:Hospital rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf inst:Institution ;    rdfs:label "Hospital" ;    rdfs:comment "A health care institution providing patient treatment." .inst:Library rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf inst:Institution ;    rdfs:label "Library" ;    rdfs:comment "An institution housing a collection of books and other resources for public use." .inst:affiliatedWith rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain inst:Institution ;    rdfs:range inst:Institution ;    rdfs:label "affiliated with" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates an affiliation between two institutions." .inst:locatedIn rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain inst:Institution ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "located in" ;    rdfs:comment "Specifies the location of an institution." .inst:hasDepartment rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain inst:University ;    rdfs:range inst:Department ;    rdfs:label "has department" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates a university has a specific department." .inst:Department rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Department" ;    rdfs:comment "A specialized division within an institution, such as a university." .inst:Faculty rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf inst:Institution ;    rdfs:label "Faculty" ;    rdfs:comment "An academic staff at an institution, often part of a university." .inst:hasFaculty rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain inst:University ;    rdfs:range inst:Faculty ;    rdfs:label "has faculty" ;    rdfs:comment "Signifies that a university has a certain faculty." .inst:ResearchCenter rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf inst:Institution ;    rdfs:label "Research Center" ;    rdfs:comment "An institution focused on research and development." .inst:associatedWith rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain inst:ResearchCenter ;    rdfs:range inst:University ;    rdfs:label "associated with" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates a research center's association with a university." .inst:medicalCenter rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf inst:Hospital ;    rdfs:label "Medical Center" ;    rdfs:comment "A larger hospital offering extensive medical services." .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: institution. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```ttl@prefix : <http://example.org/institution#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .:Institution rdf:type owl:Class .:University rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Institution .:College rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Institution .:ResearchInstitute rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Institution .:School rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Institution .:hasDepartment rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Institution ;    rdfs:range :Department .:Department rdf:type owl:Class .:hasName rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Institution ;    rdfs:range rdf:Literal .:locatedIn rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Institution ;    rdfs:range :Location .:Location rdf:type owl:Class .:hasAffiliationWith rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Institution ;    rdfs:range :Organization .:Organization rdf:type owl:Class .:hasStudent rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Institution ;    rdfs:range :Student .:Student rdf:type owl:Class .:hasFaculty rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Institution ;    rdfs:range :FacultyMember .:FacultyMember rdf:type owl:Class .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: institution.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .:Institution rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Institution" ;    rdfs:comment "A generic class representing an organization or establishment founded for a specific purpose." .:EducationalInstitution rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Institution ;    rdfs:label "Educational Institution" ;    rdfs:comment "An institution dedicated to education and learning." .:ResearchInstitution rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Institution ;    rdfs:label "Research Institution" ;    rdfs:comment "An institution focused on conducting research." .:GovernmentInstitution rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Institution ;    rdfs:label "Government Institution" ;    rdfs:comment "An institution run by the government." .:University rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :EducationalInstitution ;    rdfs:label "University" ;    rdfs:comment "A higher education and research institution which offers academic degrees." .:College rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :EducationalInstitution ;    rdfs:label "College" ;    rdfs:comment "An educational institution offering undergraduate education." .:Agency rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :GovernmentInstitution ;    rdfs:label "Agency" ;    rdfs:comment "A government agency responsible for a specific function." .:hasAffiliation rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Institution ;    rdfs:range :Institution ;    rdfs:label "hasAffiliation" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates a formal association between two institutions." .:establishedYear rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Institution ;    rdfs:range rdfs:Literal ;    rdfs:label "establishedYear" ;    rdfs:comment "The year the institution was founded." .```
